title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. C, pt. 256 - Food Salvagers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. C, pt. 256 - Food Salvagers

State Regulations
§ 256.1 - Examination and condemnation of unwholesome food and damaged utensils
§ 256.2 - Notice to commissioner
§ 256.3 - Movement of seized foods
§ 256.4 - Records
§ 256.5 - Storage and removal of waste material and unfit foods
§ 256.6 - Required rooms
§ 256.7 - Sanitation requirements
§ 256.8 - Standards for damaged food containers
§ 256.9 - Sale of foods in damaged containers to a licensed food salvager
§ 256.10 - Visual aids for the inspection of food containers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. VI, subch. C, pt. 256

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §222

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
